item.title: Version 4.9.0
item.description:
Focusmo 4.9.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Drag to Focus: Simply hold Fn key and drag to select any task in any app to quickly start or add it to app for later
  • More Global Shortcuts: Now you can use shortcut to just select and start the task.
